title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki - XWiki
content:
cjdelisle - (00:45): XWIKI-2214  
jvelociter left at 01:20 (Quit: jvelociter  
cjdelisle - (02:10): hmm wonder what happens if I create a XClass with a float number, create some objects with decimals, then change it to an int?  
cjdelisle - (02:16): forced round. that answers that.

cjdelisle - (11:11): night.  
xwikibot joined #xwiki at 23:40  
sdumitriu - (23:40): XWIKI-299  
cjdelisle - (23:40): It doesn't crash with an exception but once a class is set to non-multiple select, it can't be set back.  
abusenius - (23:42): btw, am I supposed to be able to close jira issues that somebody else have opened?  
cjdelisle - (23:42): I have a ui test which seems to show it. The next test deletes and creates the class and object page and it's still stuck as non-multi select.  
cjdelisle - (23:43): It may well be a display issue.  
sdumitriu - (23:46): abusenius: I'll check Jira rights tomorrow, please remind me  
sdumitriu - (23:47): cjdelisle: Strange, what you're describing shouldn't happen  
cjdelisle - (23:47): I could pastebin the test I'm running.  
cjdelisle - (23:50): hmm added some infrastructure, have to commit with an @Ignore
